Pre-Game Insights: India will compete against Canada in the Group A match of the T20 World Cup 2024 at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium in Lauderhill.
India has already secured their qualification through to the Super 8 stage of the tournament.
Canada needs to put up a good showing against India to stay in the hunt for the Super 8 spot in the T20 World Cup 2024.
The Central Broward Regional Park Stadium in Lauderhill has been marred by incessant rains during the T20 World Cup 2024, with one of the matches already being washed out without a ball being bowled.

The average first innings score of 166 at this venue in T20I history indicates that it could produce a batting pitch where the teams have to start a bit cautiously in the early overs before taking on the batters.
